categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: This shuttle copilot was a male human who lived during the reign of the Galactic Empire. During the Galactic Civil War, he was the copilot of the Lambda-class T-4a shuttle CZ-246, under the shuttle's pilot. Sometime after, he was killed by a pirate-controlled CR90 corvette during a skirmish, along with the pilot.
